changeSet.author: zlatkov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `state` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `capital` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `code` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `countryid` int DEFAULT NULL, `details` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL, `last_modified_by` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `last_modified_date` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `FK26mi9hxhe1phwyqkvwb4ygot5` (`countryid`), CONSTRAINT `FK26mi9hxhe1phwyqkvwb4ygot5` FOREIGN KEY (`countryid`) REFERENCES `country` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
